title: News Index
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with an MLB.com account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select the News tab (or menu item)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see a list of news stories

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I see the first story
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the story will have a large thumbnail template

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I see the stories after a large template thumbnail story
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will follow a 2 story template

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I see stories following the 2 story template
AND they are not Stories with editorialImpactHigh
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the following 4 stories will follow a single story template

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I see Stories with editorialImpactHigh
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the story will have a large thumbnail template

title: Team Selector
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the News Index

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the team selector in the top menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a list of all MLB teams and MLB is presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects one of the teams form the menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an updated index of news stories related to that team displays

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a news article from the News Index
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a user will see a webview with the article displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user presses back from a news article
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be in the same location on the index from where they launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN dark mode is set
AND a news article loads
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see a webview with the article displayed
AND the webview is also dark mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select a “Recommended” article from inside a news story
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will navigate to the article within the current webview

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am viewing a News article
AND the current article was linked to from a previous article
AND I trigger a system back navigation
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the previous article

title: Open News Articles in Spanish
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is using a phone with language set to Spanish
WHEN the user navigates to "Noticias" tab and opens a news article
THEN the news article should be displayed successfully and in spanish

title: Network Error Display
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the News page
custom_steps: WHEN a request for news data fails
custom_expected:
THEN show an error banner 
AND the text “Update Failed”
AND a context button “Retry

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user on the News page
AND the error banner is shown
AND a “Retry” button is available
custom_steps_separated.expected:
WHEN the user taps Retry
THEN a request for news data occurs
AND view is refreshed if successful

title: Remember News Index Position
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is reading a news article
custom_steps: WHEN they navigate back to the index
custom_expected: THEN they will be brought pack to the position in the index where they were and not back to the top of the index

title: Share link
custom_preconds: GIVEN a mobile user is reading an article
custom_steps: WHEN they tap the share button
custom_expected: THEN the native share tray should launch allowing the user to select how they want to share the article

title: Short Content
custom_steps: WHEN I open the news tab
custom_expected:
THEN I should see “short-content” stories created by editorial
AND when I select them, they should open the url in a chrome tab

Note: can use Charles to identify items of type 'shortcontent' in mast news team index call
